"

The drill simulates the consecutive rainfall in Xinzheng City, causing large-scale power outages and communication blockages in multiple regions. The emergency communication guarantee emergency plan of China Mobile Henan Company is quickly activated, and the important area business recovery team, vehicles and various professional equipment are quickly assembled at the scene to carry out emergency repairs.
